text: geuleona bumoga geudaelo hayeogeum geudaega alji moshaneun geos-eul sungbaeke hayeo naleul bolsinhandamyeon geugeos-e daehaeseoneun geudeul-eul ttaleuji malmyeo hyeon seeseo bumo-ege sunjonghago naegelohyanghae hoegaehaneun jaui gil-eul ttaleula geuhu neohuineun naegelo gwiuihalini geuttae naega neohuiege neohuiga haenghan ildeul-eul allyeo julila
